---
title: 'Manual colors in ggplot2'
author: Sebastian Gerdes
date: '2023-02-21'
# categories: [testing]
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
iris |> ggplot(aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, colour = Species)) + geom_point(size = 3) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c('lightgray', 'blue', 'black'), aesthetics = c('colour', 'fill'))
```
